name: surrealdb-memory
description: Knowledge graph memory system with SurrealDB, MCP tools, confidence scoring, and LLM-powered extraction
author: Clawdbot

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for text-embedding-3-small embeddings and GPT-4o-mini extraction. Recommend using a scoped key with limited permissions.

network_installer.description: Runs 'curl -sSf https://install.surrealdb.com | sh' to install SurrealDB binary
network_installer.mitigation: Review installer at URL before running, or install SurrealDB manually from official releases

source_patching.description: scripts/integrate-clawdbot.sh uses sed to patch Clawdbot source files (server-methods.ts, navigation.ts, app.ts) to add Memory UI tab
source_patching.mitigation: Run integration manually with code review, or skip UI integration entirely

service_management.description: Gateway handlers can start SurrealDB server and run schema imports
service_management.mitigation: Start SurrealDB manually instead of using auto-repair

python_packages.description: Installs surrealdb, openai, pyyaml Python packages via pip
python_packages.mitigation: Use a dedicated venv and review requirements.txt

local_file_access.description: Reads MEMORY.md and memory/*.md files for knowledge extraction
local_file_access.mitigation: Review extracted content before enabling auto-extraction

securityNotes.default_credentials: Examples use root/root for SurrealDB. Change these in production and bind to localhost only.
securityNotes.api_key_scope: OPENAI_API_KEY is used for embeddings and LLM extraction. Use a key with minimal permissions.
securityNotes.auto_repair: Gateway auto-repair can run network installers. Disable autonomous invocation or review before allowing.

installWarnings: This skill executes 'curl https://install.surrealdb.com | sh' - review the installer URL before running
Integration script patches Clawdbot source files - backup your installation first
Default SurrealDB credentials (root/root) are insecure - change for any network-exposed deployment
Knowledge extraction sends content to OpenAI API - review what files will be processed
